item.title: New Container: xemu
item.description: We have released a new container for xemu! xemu is a free and open-source application that emulates the original Microsoft Xbox game console, enabling people to play their original Xbox games on Windows, macOS, and Linux systems.
item.content:
We have released a new container for xemu!

xemu is a free and open-source application that emulates the original Microsoft Xbox game console, enabling people to play their original Xbox games on Windows, macOS, and Linux systems.
